channel.title: Carbohydrate Metabolism on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Carbohydrate Metabolism on funPlantGenes

item.title: CsSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSUT1 Gene Name: Sucrose Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the Sucrose Transporter CsSUT1 Causes Male Sterility by Altering Carbohydrate Supply.

item.title: IbSnRK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbSnRK1 Gene Name: sucrose non-fermenting-1-related protein kinase-1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: These findings indicate that IbSnRK1 improves starch content and quality through systematical up-regulation of the genes and the increase in key enzyme activities involved in starch biosynthesis pathway in transgenic sweet potato.

item.title: KASI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G084300 Gene Symbol: KASI Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: KASI is a core fatty acid synthesis enzyme that is involved in the conversion of sucrose into oil in developing seeds.

item.title: MdbHLH3-27
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD00G1130200 Gene Symbol: MdbHLH3-27 Gene Name: Malus domestica basic helix–loop–helix 3 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g107600 Gene Symbol: MS3 Gene Name: MALE STERILITY 3 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: MALE STERILITY 3 encodes a plant homeodomain-finger protein for male fertility in soybean MS3 encodes a transcription factor with a PHD-finger.

item.title: PpbZIP44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpbZIP44 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: A pear S1-bZIP transcription factor PpbZIP44 modulates carbohydrate metabolism, amino acid, and flavonoid accumulation in fruits.

item.title: PpSnRK1βγ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Prupe.6G323700 Gene Symbol: PpSnRK1βγ Gene Name: sucrose non-fermenting 1 related kinase Genome: reference peach genome (release version 2.

item.title: SlAREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlAREB1 Gene Name: ABA-response element binding factor 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor AREB1 regulates primary metabolic pathways in tomato fruits.

item.title: SlGRAS9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc06g036170 Gene Symbol: SlGRAS9 Gene Name: GRAS transcription factor 9 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The SlGRAS9-SlZHD17 transcriptional cascade regulates chlorophyll and carbohydrate metabolism contributing to fruit quality traits in tomato.
